FuncDef: The display access-user slot command displays information about the access users on the board in a specified slot.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To monitor the information about the access users or locate the user access fault, you can run the display access-user slot command to view information about the access users on the board in a specified slot on the device.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
If the command output contains "Info: No online user!", the number of queried users based on the specified parameter is 0 or the device does not support query based on the specified parameter.
